name: Poultry Parade
description: These chickens need your help to escape a dangerous facility. Sharp and pointy things are your worst enemy. Fear not, for a chicken can not only jump, but it can also FLAP!

name: Camper Flipper
description: A country mechanic who's been scrapping various vehicles, trailers and parts at his place for years. Looking at the market trends, he decides to make millions by turning his trophies into cool campers, dream homes on wheels.

name: Starship Corporation: Cruise Ships
description: Expand your business and master space tourism. This DLC challenges you to design and build for a newly emerging recreational market. Fit as many passenger cabins and profitable entertainment facilities into 9 new fuselages. And don’t forget the lifeboats!

name: Inexplicable Deaths In Damipolis: Inner Thoughts
description: One tragic night, the power dome of Damipolis died during dinner under strange circumstances... What were they doing there? What really happened that night? And... who is the culprit? Solve the mystery in this first-person 3D graphic adventure, inspired by classic film noir.

name: Time Machine: Find Objects. Hidden Pictures Game
description: An exciting adventure through space and time awaits for you in the newest hidden object game! Immerse yourself into a real investigation, full of intrigue and mysterious temporal anomalies!

name: Synthetik 2
description: SYNTHETIK 2 is a bold continuation of SYNTHETIK: Legion Rising. Fight a world overrun by the relentless Machine Legion. Experience the next level in gun-play and upgrade yourself beyond measure to rival their Gods. Can you defeat the Heart of Armageddon?

name: LeftWay 2
description: Nampung encounters the nightmare again and this time also includes her relative people.

name: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game - Digital Edition: A Dance With Dragons
description: In A Dance with Dragons expansion, experience the era of the eponym book alongside an alternative 6-player setup and new sets of house cards for shorter and more intense game. Radically change your game with this expert scenario for A Game of Thrones, the Board Game Digital Edition.

name: Bigfoot Blood Trap
description: A woman inherits her grandfathers land. While hunting a Bigfoot attacks her and her family. After capturing the monster, they find a man who will pay any price to exact his revenge.

name: Age of Fear 4: The Victor's Experiment Expansion
description: A mysterious danger lurks within this abandoned laboratory, but it's locked away behind the lab's many puzzles. Are you brave enough to venture inside and uncover the truth of the unnatural entity that resides here?

name: Age of Fear 4: The Storm Mountain Expansion
description: A mysterious creature is terrorizing your Sea People allies! Be warned, this monster may be more than meets the eye. Prepare to face all manner of threats on this quest to restore peace and prosperity to your new friends.

name: Cafe Paris
description: Welcome to a game about coffee and conversation. This is a 3D narrative coffee shop sim located in the heart of Paris. You run a 24/7 open coffee shop between the foot of the Eiffel Tower & the banks of the Seine river. Serve coffee & food to your customers and learn about their stories.

name: Dung Beetle Strike
description: Inspired by the classic Goof Troop, solve puzzles, fight against chimeras and play with Dung Beetle brothers on this exotic island.

name: Pirates VR: Jolly Roger
description: Pirates VR Jolly Roger is a game alluding to old stories of the all-time most famous Pirates. The journey into the pirate world begins on a deserted island. Despite its extraordinary charm, the land hides a number of secrets and mysteries to be solved as well as obstacles and traps.

name: Super Meat Boy: Race Mode
description: You know how you have that one annoying friend who would always be like "I'm so much better at Super Meat Boy than you" and "If we could race I would destroy you!" well guess what, get some potato chips, grab some controllers, and reluctantly call that friend over so you can shove his undeserving feelings of...

name: Queerskins: ark
description: Queerskins: ARK is a 6DoF interactive virtual reality experience. Reading a diary left by the estranged son, a Catholic mother finds a way to transcend herself and her grief by imagining him alive and in love. Ark allows you to enter her imagination and co-create the lovers' intimate dance through your body position and movements.

name: Work and Girls
description: This is the puzzle with a several levels of difficulty and beautiful artbook. All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.

name: Batallas Galacticas
description: a company is hiring people to drive a spaceship across the solar system, time to do some work and make some money!

name: CanCan the Game
description: CanCan, the game of color and creation; a puzzle game using multicolored tiles.

name: Hentai Cyberpunk
description: Fight against robotic enemies ! In a sexy and futuristic Wave Based Game !

name: Super People
description:
Super People, developed by Wonder People, is a next-generation battle royale FPS game for PC.

Super People features 12 different playable classes each with diverse abilities and unique skills. In the end, only one super solider or squad will remain standing.

name: Hanaby's Summer Festival
description: A 2D platforming adventure featuring fireworks.

name: Happy Guy
description: Haro is a doctor. He was fired after problems with a nurse. His life changed a lot after that. He meets more beautiful girls. Who will be the most important girl in his life?

name: Space Ship Infinity
description: Returning to the classic style of spaceship games in pixel art. Survive in space as many enemy ships and anything else that can destroy your ship, get all the advantages and improvements available to get your best score.

name: Veronica's Body
description: How will your deepest desires change you again? Veronica's Body is all about erotic transformation and corruption fetish combat that flawlessly blends RPG style combat and kink in order to tackle titillating bosses and solve sultry secrets.

name: Rainbow Fuego
description: A fun, colorful, casual arcade game for all ages! Two games in one! Enjoy a casual solo mode in which you keep the ball inside the circle while listening to relaxing chill hop music, or challenge the AI to a game of space hockey! Developed by Jon Harvey Games.

name: Barnard's Star
description: Snipe your friends, electrocute your enemies and rain down acidic slime in the Barnard’s Star system, 6 light years from Earth. A multiplayer, turn-based tactics battler with no micro-transactions and no random chance — ingenuity is the only way to victory!

name: First Racer
description: First Racer is a racing game with convenient arcade control, crashes, a list of leaders, nice graphics and much more.

name: Bugz!
description: Venture into the world Bugz to capture, research and compete with your team of Bugz!

name: Pistol Dancer
description: Twos hands two guns! Shoot'em up style rhythmic FPS. Press the trigger alongside music beats to unleash devastating power to the enemies Your enemies are little virus bits trying to reach the heart, and you are the last line of defence!

name: My New Memories
description: Memories...One of the most important things in our lives. But what happens if you forget who you are? If you don't remember anything? Then you can only hope that the people that do know who you are help you out...This is your journey...On your way to finding new memories...

name: 2051 AD. Your life
description: Sin descripción

name: Slave Fighter X
description: SlaveFighterX is a 2D side scrolling lewd fantasy Beat´em up, where you fight old school arcade style against hordes of voluptuous enemies and unique bosses while ripping each other’s clothes apart!

name: Fore Score
description: Fore Score is a multiplayer miniature golf game with a twist! Build the hole as you play, alternating between placing hazards on the course, and putting, trying to score the lowest strokes while messing with your friends!

name: Pathfinders: Mini Words
description: Help Pathfinders discover the name of day-by-day objects in English. A unique mix of logic puzzle and word search. Great for English learners.

name: This Game is Trash
description: This Game is Trash. Yes, it's literal trash. You are a KEYBOARD and you ROLL on a UFO all the way to the END! WHAT MORE COULD YOU WANT?? But seriously, can you make it to the end? Because it took us like 1000 tries. We counted. So play the game and see if you can. Your life depends on it now.

name: Buried Under Rocks
description: Would you choose the lie over the truth? Buried Under Rocks is an action and puzzling game with two different endings.

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ
description: "Sky Goddess Ⅱ" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with nostalgic movie images.

name: Ambidextrous Psychopath
description: Ambidextrous Psychopath is a difficult 2D platformer designed to challenge players to use both sides of their brain simultaneously to control two separate player objects. With a full custom OST and a robust 81 level campaign, Ambidextrous Psychopath offers hours of challenging gameplay.

name: Amazing Pyramids: Rebirth
description: Amazing Pyramids are back! Lead a group of scientists through addicting word adventures! Play now and solve intricate word puzzles to unravel the secrets of an ancient city! Use your wits and vocabulary to survive the blistering sun!

name: The Faded
description: An ongoing kidnapping mystery of little kids from past 10 years, can a 14 year old girl stop it?

name: Rainy City: Pandemic
description: Explore Rainy City, meet its residents and save your sister!

name: The Adventures on Uranus
description: The Adventures on Uranus is a short interactive experience. The game provides a chance to explore the imaginary planet of Uranus for a few minutes.

name: The Hardest Game in the Universe
description: Why are you getting to know one of the most difficult games in the universe, Embark on this challenge with the new casual game, platform that aims to become one of the games most hated for its difficulty,

name: Sheep Cutter
description: Cute clicker game with super simple controls which will make you forget about everyday stress. This game will take you on a farm where the only goal is to cut as much wool as you can, you will want to play this game all night long.

name: Kate Kite
description: Kate Kite is a running game, beautiful painting style, beautiful music,You will love it.

name: Ona: A Mystical Art Experience
description: Travel across the world in an interactive and meditative journey to resolve the quest of our humanity.

name: Blue Bird Land Ep. 1
description: Blue Bird Land is an AVG with horror and puzzle elements. There are six endings and four levels. In each level, the form of the game is unique and different from others. Let’s follow the alluring characters, addicted to the dangerous amusement park!

name: Muzegate
description: Muzegate is a virtual concert application with sensational techno and EDM music, vivid lightshows, DJ view and 3 original environments. Ideal for virtual reality, but PC support is also included.

name: Color War
description: Color War is an extremely difficult bullet hell and boss rush style game where you attempt to bring color back to a shattered world.

name: 只是一座楼
description: Sin descripción

name: Defend Till Sunshine
description: Defend Till Sunshine is a exploration-survival game which you will experience with your puppy. You need to survive againts multiple situations. Discover across the land, find villages, learn craft techniques, interact with villagers and learn tips from them, build your own house and more!

name: Space Junk
description: Intense action, retro-styled visuals, a sizzling synth soundtrack and tons of cool Sci-Fi references, all rendered in vibrant, neon graphics. Get your trigger-finger ready, turn the lights down, the sound up, and blast your way through level after level of fast paced, Junk smashing action!

name: Bloody Cruise
description: Bloody Cruise is an adventure game where you play as a vampire travelling on an airship. Your task is to find the traitor and try not to succumb to your dark urges. In this suspense story you will explore the airship, talk to colorful characters on board and decide their future.

name: Spellthief Erinn
description: Spellthief Erinn is a 2D Puzzle Platformer where you take control of the enemies magic attacks and use them to your advantage. Solve the misteries, explore the enviroment and reach the chest with a hidden spell. Find, steal and collect them all!

name: Cave Explorers
description: Play as a member of the Cave Explorers. A team of specialist puzzle solvers who's role is to dodge traps and decipher clues in order to unlock hidden rooms and treasures for archaeologists to study.

name: Jian Yu Ji Ban
description: SAS is a special rpg-like game. The game focuses on character collection, cultivation, team building, production, and dungeons.

name: The Seven Keys: Escape Room
description: Escape Room The Seven Keys is a graphic mystery adventure where your logical reasoning will help you escape, in addition to solving different challenges.

name: Speedgunner Ultra
description: Speedgunner Ultra is a dynamic platformer in which you can transform your character into a combat aircraft by pressing a button. Use all sorts of tricks to speed up and try to complete the level faster than anyone else.

name: Rescue Operation
description: Is a first-person shooter game. The game will follow the scenario of the game, and destroy the enemies in its path

name: Dab's Not Dead
description: Buckle up for a hacking rhythm game about saving Cyberspace from a mysterious threat! Move to the beat, groove your way through security systems, and fight the Virus corrupting friendly Cyberfolk (also in local co-op!). Make your own levels using your own music or the official tunes!

name: Hexurb
description: Hexurb is a calm, peaceful city builder where you can relax after a hard day and just have a good time!

name: Kidgilantes
description: Rescue all animals from their enclosures without being caught by adults! But, you can’t do it alone. You and your friend will have to dress up as adults to get by in this zoo!

name: Fast Food Simulator
description: Fast Food Simulator is a restaurant and cooking game where you can cook and serve various fast food.

name: Drunk Soccer is the Best Soccer
description: Drunk Soccer is the Best Soccer– a third-person soccer simulator. The main feature of this game is that all the players on the pitch are drunk as skunks.

name: Crypt of the Gods
description: Play through a procedurally generated dungeon as a wizard trying to obtain more power to free themselves as well as people like you. Overcome the dungeon gaining power, new abilities, and new magic as you transverse through the dark depths.

name: Starship Intruder
description: The interface IS the game. Using your keyboard in a command prompt-style, you will engage in combat with enemy spaceships, raid planets, collect warp cores, draw space cards to obtain advantages (and disadvantages) and much more.

name: The Case of Maneki
description:
The Case of Maneki is a Detective game about a Maneki Neko, or lucky cat, following his adopted guardian to find the truth that is hidden between a series of gruesome murders.

You play as Kichiro and Nobutoshi, the detective and the apprentice of the city. With murders being committed at every corner, it is up to you to solve this case that traces back to years ago.

name: Microcosmum 2
description: A relaxing strategy game featuring unconventional gameplay. Your objectives include development, evolution, border expansion and protection of your hive.

name: Disarmed
description: A satirical fantasy puzzle game about healthcare.

name: Kingdom of Wreck Business
description: The depths of the Atlantic hide more than 12,000 sunken ships out of which at least half haven’t been located yet. As a depth explorer you will earn money from extracting valuable cargo from wrecks, grow your company, buy exploration vessels and real estate.

name: Deep Therapy
description: Be a psychologist, explore patients minds and search for lost memories in their subconscious. Then make a diagnosis according to your experience and the memories you have collected.

name: Book of Sophia
description: Book of Sophia is an action adventure with roguelite elements. Follow the dungeon crawling journey of Sophia to discover the secrets of the book and the mysterious world.

name: Fourzy
description: A competitive match four game.

name: The Curse of Fafnir
description: You play as a rogue mage who tapped into dark arts to try and gain more power but as soon as you opened a dusty old book, Fafnir was summoned and not pleased, which caused him to place a curse on you and sent you to a eternal dungeon. Survive by beating the dungeon and breaking the curse.

name: Diery Heaven
description: A simple parkour game in calm!

name: Kingslayer: The First Assassin
description: A different Sokoban style game where you have limited grid-movement and attacks in each level. Feel like an assassin in this minimalist puzzle.

name: Labyrinth Legend
description: Labyrinth Legend is an action RPG with hack and slash elements. Explore the automatically-generated dungeons, collect powerful equipment, and battle against unknown, formidable enemies!

name: Ocak
description: Ocak is a turn based 2D/3D dungeon crawler. Explore stories, upgrade your weapons and fight against the Gʟɪᴛ𝒸ʜy dungeons beneath the Epoh.

name: Intra Corpus
description: Explore the human body with the help of a miniature drone, fight off infections and viruses, and save the patient!

name: Killer Ricky
description: Play as Killer Ricky and avenge his family by killing all members of a bloodthirsty Mafia organization.

name: Chess on Ice
description: A casual sports simulation game built around using physics to throw and control throwing your rocks towards a target. Play with up to three other friends in local multiplayer, or by yourself in the 20+ stage challenge mode!

name: On Space
description: You are a pilot of a spaceship and your task is to destroy enemy spaceships and survive.

name: Namnokh
description: Namnokh is a Puzzle-Platformer where you take on the role of the nomadic Wanderer. After discovering an ancient sentient Box, you must use it's powers to bounce, change it's weight and pass through certain parts of the environment to traverse the ruins of Namnokh.

name: One4
description: Beat the AI, or your friend in this massively puzzling game in the cubes

name: Time of Piracy
description: Time of Piracy - is the simplest 2D platformer in which you have to do different levels playing as a courageous Pirate.

name: Laika
description: Laika is a third person perma-death runner game. A robot named Rico launched into the space. While Rico overcome various obstacles, his journey starts by encountering Laika's trace and ends by finding Laika!

name: Shieldwall Chronicles: Realm of Madness
description: Gather your party and venture into a corrupted land ruled by demons and dark magic. Explore freely in an open world and decide your fate in tactical, turn-based combat. Forge legendary heroes in the furnace of battle and make decisions that will have lasting ramifications for your campaign.

name: Pixelstar Hero
description: A sci-fi turn-based roguelike adventure.

name: RushOut
description: Rushout is an enthralling and hilarious 3D ragdoll platformer with simple gameplay set in fantastic flying landscapes. And the prize for the best result will spark real excitement in you! Beware of crazy chickens!

name: Wordle 4
description: Wordle 4 is a new format puzzle game from the Wordle series. 29 new categories scattered across the English alphabet from A to Z.

name: The Host
description: After a Post-Armageddon event the world has gone back to its roots living in simpler times, back to swords, kings, and war. Something is brewing in the kingdom could it be related to the first apocalyptic event?

name: Gachi Revenge
description: The adventure of our beloved hero, in which he has to overcome all the obstacles prepared by the Gachi gang. They stole the most valuable and now pay for it.

name: Speedy Gun Savage
description: Speedy Gun Savage is a first person shooter VR game where Wolf, the hero of the game is an intergalactical bounty hunter and travels to different planets to collect bounties. The game has three different planets with several enemies and three main boss.

name: Eager For Den
description: Metroidvania Survival Co-op Game in which you have to explore to survive, earn abilities to survive, play well-design characters to survive, cooperate with your firends to survive and survive to survive.

name: Aero Battle
description: Aero Battle - indie simulator of air battles, executed in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

name: Just Shake It
description: Just shake it left and right If you make a mistake, rewind time.

name: Unicorns on Unicycles
description: Turn your horns into swords in this wacky and sweet physics-driven rainbowcore fighting game featuring jousting unicorns… on unicycles.

name: Doggone Hungry
description: Doggone Hungry is a delicious game about eating food, getting fat, and being a dog. Your favorite toy, Quackerjack, is always getting stolen, and superior dog logic has determined that you must get fat to save him!

name: Astroroxx
description: Astroroxx is for everyone at every age. Surrounding 360° space attacks with virtual asteroids and you have to fight them. Shoot all asteroids within 90 seconds to reach the next level, and defend your high score. Featuring different space environments and a music tracks for the right sci-fi mood.

name: Crisis Arcana
description: There you were, ecstatic that you had been chosen to serve as the grand wizard's newest apprentice. Next thing you knew he's legless and horrific monstrosities are now roaming the realms. It's your job now to go throughout these realms and defeating the horrors that lie in wait.

name: Green Marquis
description: Green Marquis can change gravity Use the geometry of the level to solve puzzles.

name: Planet Miner
description: Remove fog, look for and mine minerals, construct buildings, upgrade the rover and reach the portal.

name: All-Inn
description: An unusual inn simulator fit on a single screen.

name: The Alchemist Alekki
description: This is a game about running a potion shop and saving time! Alekki has been accused of creating a potion that caused areas of time to merge together. Help her uncover the truth by defeating powerful Echoes of time in different Time-Warped areas.

name: The Depths
description: You are a 45 year old man who wakes up in this new world trying to figure out its secrets as you explore this first person horror you will find your self sneaking pass threats hiding from the shadow beset and solving puzzles.

name: The Happy Little Virus
description: As a virus, attack the servers of charities on orders from your sinister creator that seem strange... maybe even unethical? Journey down into their computers and engage in frantic debris-strewn battles with the antiviruses in this comedy puzzle shooter.

name: Marble Ball Racing
description: Marble ball racing is a racing game. Player will control marble ball to race with other 24 AI marble ball in sci-fi stages theme.

name: Phogbound
description: The story about hungry creatures, who are living in the Fog.

name: Vojo
description: Vojo - is a casual game in which you move forward through a tunnel. You need to avoid obstacles that appear in your path, and collect white cubes for which you get points. How many points can you collect?

name: Thief's Shelter
description: Take up the role of Detective James as you try to uncover a mysterious criminal's hidden identity. Reveal deep and disturbing secrets, solve unique puzzles and bring the schemes of a dark Cult to light. All under the effect of Dementia, a syndrome capable of making you mistrust even your own self

name: Mysterica
description: Experience VR combat as if you were an anime character with special abilities!Draw a magic circle with your own hands! Swinging the sword sends a slashing wave into the air.PvP and PvE VR action game. Enjoy the speedy and tense combat.

name: Rogue Party 2
description: Explore dungeons, defeat bosses and earn epic rewards with up to three other friends (and occasionally hit them with potions) in this playful Rogue-Like adventure.

name: SushiVR
description: SushiVR is a VR game in which the player becomes a general of a sushi restaurant and holds the sushi as the customer wants one after another and provides them quickly.

name: Ragdoll Knight
description: Ragdoll Knight - A platformer game with a physical world, where the player controls a drunken knight who stumbles over something, loses his balance from the blows of arriving birds and is about to break his head on a nearby stone.

name: Raw April Day
description: A Victorian, Mystery Point-And-Click game set in Post-World War England, in which Jacqueline searches for her missing husband in his apartment and horrifyingly gets in and over her head.

name: Arcade Legend
description: Arcade Legend is an arcade simulator and management RPG. Clean up your run-down venue, add new games and customize the layout and look. Build your reputation to continue unlocking content and play officially licensed, modern arcade titles as you unravel the secrets the venue holds.

name: Cannibal Coast
description: Will you get revenge on your crew, head back to civilisation. Or will you succumb to the wicked ways of the Cannibal Coast?

name: Bravers
description: Deep in the underground world of a planet devastated by Great Impact, Bravers invites you to become a captain of your custom ship. Captain who leads his crew through the fascinating journey full of danger, mysteries, friends and foes. Are you brave enough?

name: Heart of Siam
description: Classic 2D action retro platformer. Are you ready to collect all the diamonds and find the secret caves?Heart of Siam, after 14 years of development, now on Steam.

name: Block Breaker Ninja
description: Block Break Ninja is a well-known block breaking style game. You will be the Ninja to beat Shogun (military manager in old Japanese society) to get back his girlfriend. There are 25+ exciting stages, and you just have to grab your mouse for controller!

name: Hero Team
description: A side-scrolling multiplayer shooter. 1-4 local players can fight 4v4 battles online and offline, or speedrun practice missions.

name: Furniture World
description: Furniture World is a unique chance to become a handyman. Buy, repair and improve furnitures. Give them a second life and sell them at a profit!

name: Riftnote
description: Write into perspective - with a simple and intuitive spatial notebook.

name: Gigapocalypse
description: Become a customizable giant monster with manifold skills in Gigapocalypse, inspired by classical Kaijū movies such as “Godzilla” and “King Kong” and the game classic “Rampage”.

name: Gladii
description: The enemies of humanity lay siege from all directions. You must fight your way through hordes of demons, zombies, ogres, and more as you unlock new characters and battlefields! Play solo or team up with three additional players in this 1-4 player couch co-op arena battle game.

name: The World
description: 小明因黑人抬棺穿越到神秘新大陆开始了传（造）奇（孽）的一生。这是一款颠覆性的RPG扮演类游戏，是一个完全的开放性世界，你不再被主线剧情所拘束可以自由的在这个世界的各个角落探索，寻找宝物，或是完成一件件难忘的冒险。在游戏中做一个坏人亦或者是一个好人都由你自己决定，你还可以加入各种门派，学习绝学，制作装备炼制法宝等等，直到你从一个屌丝成长为一个大屌丝！

name: Sweety Little Witch
description: Sweety Little Witch is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Quick Race
description: Everything you need to do is very simple - just race and over take every other car on the track to win the race! Quick Race is a simple racing game where you can compete with AI or on a split screen with your friend.

name: Routine Racers
description: Crazy side-scrolling 3D game set in daily routines like escaping from work, buying at the supermarket, having a drink in a bar, stopping a fire or capturing some narcos. 10 Routine Levels and an extra Endless Mode with unique skills to master: dodge, jump, roll, engage, brake, turbo, build and push.

name: Country Adventure
description: Adventure and survival game that takes place in an open world RPG style, where you will start as a small farmer and you can even overcome dungeons full of enemies, decorate houses you buy or build, buy vehicles, fish, hunt, trade, raise animals and much more.

name: Box Cats Puzzle
description: This is a puzzle game. A lot of cute cats want to enter a box, you need to help them~！

name: Thearchy
description: A pixel art style simulation of a fantasy post-apocalyptic Earth.

name: The Telos Monument
description: The Telos Monument is a highly atmospheric 2D psychological horror adventure game set in a strange and mind-bending monument, standing at the center of the dystopian world.

name: CatMafia
description: CatMafia is an arena Shooter with slasher elements and a top view. Earn points by fighting off waves of vile wolves, jackals and mice, and buy new equipment and first aid kits to be ready to fight the fattest opponent in the end.

name: Yanyu
description: Free Open-World RPG Mobile Game of Wuxia

name: Hidiom
description: Hideom is a game whose focus is to look for English idioms that are hidden in a literal way inside the game. Each expression found rewards you with an achievement on Steam.

name: AQ First Contact
description:
Become a commander and join the forces in AQ: First Contact.

AQ is a fully cross platform mmo allowing you to fight alongside or against your friends in real time 3v3 battles. Or take the fight to pirate corporations, destroy the Red Sun and capture Night Raven bases, but watch out for Xeno invasions as you explore the galaxy!

Mine for resources, Salvage debris for new tech and research or just destroy everything and take what you want by force. Explore asteroid belts, gas clouds and nebulas to find resources and new activities.

Join a Corporation, declare war or forge alliances, bombard outposts and capture sectors. Build defense hangers and shield generators to defend, or just go for extra resources and build some asteroid mines.

name: Space Moth: Lunar Edition
description:
1CC Games’ first shoot ’em up returns with totally overhauled visuals, all-new enemies and attacks, a deeper scoring system, remixed soundtrack and fresh player powers. Space Moth: Lunar Edition is the ultimate version of the beloved cult classic

Vivid visuals: from reworked nocturnal backgrounds to new enemies and particle effects, graphics have been enhanced to give Lunar Edition a distinct style and flair of its own.
Bullet Heaven: enemy attacks have been upgraded using 1CC Games’ custom bullet pattern editor from Star Hunter DX, allowing for intricate kaleidoscopes of death to dodge through!
From Beginner to Pro: Lunar Edition adds a flexible new scoring system, built to both raise the skill ceiling so pros can aim for stratospheric high scores, while lowering the barrier to entry so beginners can jump right in.
Stellar Sounds: to suit the more intense gameplay in Lunar Edition, all of the game’s cuts have been remixed and reinvigorated to get your blood pumping!

name: Star Hunter DX & Space Moth: Lunar Edition
description:
Star Hunter DX takes you right back to the 80s with its fantastically stylized design!

Help the Bounty Hunter Luna Starr track down her former Space Pirate mates after they betrayed her and face off in interplanetary Bullet Hell fights!
Battle for high scores on the leaderboards and hone your skills in the extensive practice mode!

Space Moth: Lunar Edition is the updated Version of 1CC's vertical arcade shoot 'em up Space Moth DX.

The core elements are reworked for a brand new intense gamplay experience; the game is set across 5 stages that end in thrilling boss fights with multiple phases!
Define your playstyle and choose between the slow but powerful Moth or nimble and fast Hawk!

name: Demon Slayer Akagi
description: Battle against mythos inspired characters from around the world in this Arcade styled breakout game!

name: Ports Simulator
description:
Ports are the lifeblood of a country's economy, a cornerstone of trade and commerce. Ports places you firmly on the dock as you take charge of the hustle and bustle of loading and unloading a vast variety of goods in transit.

Will you use a forklift truck, a crane or other loaders? The choice is yours, but with frozen goods sitting in the sun, or a ship's Captain eager to set sail time is of the essence. In the world of busy international ports, cargo earns cash allowing you to invest in ever more specialist vehicles and tools but spend wisely as time and tide waits for no-one!

6 true-to-the-original detailed machines and vehicles
20 different seaports and harbours
Different goods such as containers, bulk cargos and cars
Mission and career mode
Operate divergent vehicles & machines
Load and reload harbour goods fast and effectively
Learn about the work of a stevedore

name: Create Your Own Model Railway
description: Build your own virtual model railway and watch it come to life in stunning 3D. No other software makes it as easy to create your own highly detailed tracks, stations, tunnels, towns, roads, level crossings and scenery. Ideal for railway enthusiasts of all ages, the only limit is your imagination!

name: Curse of the Pharaoh: Tears of Sekhmet
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 2
description: Our second Sea of Thieves Season sweeps in with a wealth of new content: refreshed Trials and Deeds to boost your Renown, Emissary system improvements, Forts of Fortune to conquer, Commodities to be bought and sold via Merchant Alliance Trade Routes, new and returning time-limited Events, freebies to grab through Twitch Drops and Prime Gaming, and renewed Pirate Emporium stock including the Season Two Plunder Pass!

name: Pole Position 2010
description: Pole Position 2010 will test your tactical mind and managerial skills to the limit as you head up your very own racing team. Whether you choose to take over an existing crew or establish a brand new team, you will be tasked with negotiating with drivers, suppliers and sponsors as well as participating in research and development of cutting-edge technology. Build your team from a pool of more than 200 drivers and 1000 crew members before constructing, testing and fine tuning your race car and heading to one of the 17 race tracks to put all your hard work to the test. As the manager you must decide the team's race strategy and communicate tactics throughout the race, watching them play out in real time. Races are won by a matter of seconds so one wrong decision could cost you a podium place. Once you have your team established why not challenge a friend via the multiplayer mode to decide not only who has the best team but who has the best tactical mind.

name: River Master
description: Put on your captain's hat with River Master and prepare to take on important cargo deliveries across one of the longest rivers in Europe! Command several vessels including barges, container ships and ferries to make sure that you reach your destination as fast as possible!

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: North Star
description: North Star is the twenty-first expansion for Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege. It adds one new Operator from the Star-Net Aviation.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 3
description: In Season Three’s undoubted star attraction and the game’s biggest update in years, Sea of Thieves collides with Disney’s Pirates of the Caribbean for the ultimate pirate crossover in Sea of Thieves: A Pirate’s Life! Join forces with Captain Jack Sparrow and fend off his old enemy, the notorious Davy Jones, to save the Sea of Thieves from catastrophe in this breathtaking original story.

name: Spirit of Arx
description: Spirit of Arx is a harrowing roguelike dungeon-crawler where players possess the spirits of the deceased in order to escape a labyrinthine fortress of anguish and misery.

name: The Dark Hills of Cherai 2: The Regal Scepter
description:
Explore The Dark Hills of Cherai
A powerful artefact lies locked away, entombed behind a door that can only be opened by combining 12 amulets. Find the map and you will find the answers that you seek. Journey across the dark hills, discover curious hidden objects and overcome the guardian creature to save the Regal Scepter of Cherai!

name: Shattered Minds: Encore
description: As a detective with a knack for strange cases, your Chief has assigned you to a new investigation. After a series of famous monuments vanish into thin air, you are sent to Paris to investigate a possible link between the disappearances and a calling card discovered at the scene. Play through challenging hidden object scenes and perplexing puzzles as you unravel this thrilling mystery. Can you solve the case before anything else disappears?

name: Illmatic Envelope Swamp + Radirgy Swag
description: These are overwhelming, fully loaded shooting games. If you are a fan of Radirgy, Chaos Field, and Karasu you will love also the next burning hot burning game: Illmatic Envelope from Milestone!

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger HD + TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue HD Bundle
description:
Explore 17 levels of the Australian Outback in their old-school 3D platforming glory
13 different boomerangs including the Frostyrang, Flamerang and powerful Doomerang.

name: PUBG Mobile: Season 18
description: Hundred Rhythms

name: PUBG Mobile: Season 19
description: Traverse.

name: PUBG Mobile: Season 20
description: Sin descripción

name: Low Light Combat
description: Low Light Combat is a free competitive multiplayer shooter where light is your only weapon. Matches take place during a rapidly changing day and night cycle, meaning your fast paced fights quickly become tense and thrilling battles of wit. In LLC, your health, ammo, and stamina are all tied to a single resource: Time. That means everything from firing your weapon and taking damage, to sprinting and shining your flashlight will all deplete your time. To replenish your time you must either defeat other players, or touch the reactor found in the middle of the map. But you must act fast because time... is fleeting.

name: Taisho x Alice: Episode 2
description:
TAISHO x ALICE episode 2 is a fairytale visual novel in which you must save your Prince Charming! The game is fully voiced in Japanese (excluding the main character).

As you progress through the story, you will be asked to make choices at key points that will lead you to different endings. You will take on the role of the fairytale heroine in order to rehabilitate your chosen love interest and guide him to his "happily ever after"!

name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds: Season 11
description:
Drop back into the highlands of Paramo with updated terrain and new game modes available. While there, you can try out the latest weapon balance updates that include damage increases for the Mini-14, VSS, and SCAR-L.

You can also work on the 10 new Mastery Medals added to bling up your revamped PUBG ID. On larger maps, deploy the new Emergency Pickup to grab a quick transport over to the safe zone for you and your squad. 11.1 also features Killfeed updates, new ways to find and add friends, a new Match Log, and more.

name: Summoner's Greed
description: In this idle TD game, you will strategically place your towers and cast powerful spells to defend against endless waves of the Kingdom’s mightiest heroes. Defend your ‘stolen’ (pshhh) loot against a variety of do-gooding heroes like the lowly peasant, the axe-wielding lumberjack, the ice mage and the King’s Elite Knight himself - you kinda don’t want to mess with him!

name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds: Season 12
description:
Season 12 has landed on the Battlegrounds!

Drop-in and explore our biggest Miramar update since launch; with significant visual and design improvements, a new uniquely Miramar vehicle, and an armor-destroying sniper rifle, what’s not to love?

name: Royal Battleground IO
description:
Discover the best strategies and become the best general in the world!

Create your undefeatable army and unleash it against other players in quick uncontrollable battles! Discover the best strategies and become the best general in the world!

name: DJ Meow
description: A simple game is for kids under 5 years old. With this game, a kid can mix different sounds of cats, make cat's music and make his parents happy. Besides music, this game is also about the love for pets.

name: Gamemory
description: Improve memory of kids under 5 years old with Augmented Reality. This game is for 2 people — one of the parents and little wunderkind. The adult opens every square and lets the kid remember it. After that, closes and asks the kid what kind of thing under the exact square. Well, in the end, open together to check.

name: James Bond 007: The World Is Not Enough
description:
The PlayStation version of the game has a few notable differences to its Nintendo 64 counterpart: it runs off a version of the Medal of Honor engine, and has 11 missions in contrast to the N64's 14; some of which are not shared between the two. The missions that are similar (usually those taken from the film) further tend to play out differently, and utilize completely different gadgets and weaponry.

It also does not feature additional objectives at higher difficulty modes, and only cheats are unlocked by beating specific missions at a specific difficulty. However, it does feature CD-quality music and voices, as well as video clips from the movie for cutscenes. It is single-player only, and features no multiplayer component.

name: Les: The Horror Game
description: Sin descripción

name: SafeZoneVR
description: SafeZoneVR is a VR interactive survival horror game. Players will scavenge the map trying to escape a fallen SafeZone once strong and bustling as the survivors flocked to it.

name: The Sims 4: Throwback Fit Kit
description: Outfit your Sims in retro-inspired athleisure looks with The Sims 4: Throwback Fit Kit. Take it back to nostalgic colors, bold patterns and trend-forward silhouettes with these all-new Create-a-Sim items. Updated everyday classics and workout wear elevate this unique collection - and your Sim's fashion.

name: Die After Sunset
description: Die After Sunset is a 3rd person action rogue-lite shooter with a unique mechanic featuring light and darkness. Battle for Earth and travel through time as you defeat hordes of enemies and complete random quests to create the best build possible. Can you solve the mystery behind the Murkor invasion?

name: Kyuukyoku Tiger Heli: Toaplan Arcade Garage
description:
A Compilation of Kyuukyoku Tiger (Ultimate Tiger, Known as Twin Cobra in the west) and Tiger-Heli, two classic TOAPLAN Arcade STGs as part M2's Shottrigger series of Shoot-em-up ports. This package includes arcade and home versions of both games, and the Toaplan Arcade Beat-em-up Get Star (Known in the west as Guardian) as a bonus title in the physical edition, and as DLC for the downloadable version.

The typical features of an M2STG port, including Gadgets, Arcade Challenge, Super Easy mode and a Custom mode are included.

name: Aurum Online
description: Game that is being made live in Twitch by JeroMono. An action-MMORPG with cartoon style.

name: Infidhells
description: Infidhells is a Roguelite Puzzle-Game based on various stuff and of course Tetris. You'll encounter many foes, bosses, hectic items and game changing mechanics. Anyway, it should be great (when it actually works).

name: Nuigurumi no Cakeya-san: Mahou no Patissiere
description: A 3DS game focused on baking.

name: Coridden
description: Become the beasts you defeat in this action-packed RPG! Equip and upgrade both your human and beast form and shapeshift between them anytime. Venture out solo or ride together in co-op on a journey to uncover the dark secrets sealed away inside a legendary city.

name: Steel Crew
description: Join a Tank as a Driver, Gunner or Commander and team up with and against other Tanks in Tank Vs Tank combat Where tactics and communication is key

name: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: Arcade Edition
description: In this arcade companion game to Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 and the second arcade installment of the Mario & Sonic series. As with the Nintendo Switch version, the game takes place in Tokyo, Japan, home of the 2020 Summer Olympics, and features events from both 2020, as well as 2D Events from the 1964 Summer Olympics, which were also held in Tokyo.

name: Robolife: Days with Aino
description: There's nothing better than living with a robot girl! Get your wrench on and show her your mechanic power! But beware, she might be more than just a regular robot...

name: The Truth About 9th Company
description: The Truth About 9th Company is the first Russian documentary computer game. The game simulates the historical battle for Hill 3234 which took place on 7–8 January 1988 in southern Afghanistan between Soviet paratroop units of the 345th Independent Guards Airborne Regiment and mujahideen.

name: Far Beyond the World
description:
"Wake up!" says the voice, and you open your eyes in a strange cabin in the woods with only a vague recollection of the life you've left behind. Despite appearances, you know that something isn't quite right.

Set on an adventure, trying to piece together the puzzle of your past, as well as forge a new life among the Wolves of Avalan as you try to steer clear of their tribal politics. Your heart will be your compass, but can you trust your feelings when they're so easily clouded? Love can be both a boon and a distraction. Choose your friends carefully and your enemies more careful still.

You had one life already… there might not be a third.

name: Final Fantasy
description: The original Final Fantasy comes to life with completely new graphics and audio! A remodeled 2D take on the first game in the world-renowned Final Fantasy series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Final Fantasy II
description: The original Final Fantasy II comes to life with completely new graphics and audio! A remodeled 2D take on the second game in the world-renowned Final Fantasy series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Final Fantasy III
description: The original Final Fantasy III comes to life with completely new graphics and audio! A remodeled 2D take on the third game in the world-renowned Final Fantasy series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Final Fantasy IV
description: The original Final Fantasy IV comes to life with completely new graphics and audio! A remodeled 2D take on the fourth game in the world-renowned Final Fantasy series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Final Fantasy V
description: The original Final Fantasy V comes to life with completely new graphics and audio as a 2D pixel remaster! A remodeled take on the fifth game in the world-renowned Final Fantasy series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Final Fantasy VI
description: The original Final Fantasy VI comes to life with completely new graphics and audio! A remodeled 2D take on the sixth game in the world-renowned Final Fantasy series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: 100 Hidden Cats
description: 100 Hidden Cats is a hidden object game in the city setting with black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style.

name: Uchuu Daisakusen Choco Vader: Uchuu Kara No Shinryakusha
description: Sin descripción

name: Uchuu Daisakusen Choco Vader: Contactee
description: Sin descripción

name: Uchuu Daisakusen Choco Vader: Jinrui Yuukai Keikaku Abduction
description: Web game. Can no longer be played.

name: Taz-Mania
description: This version of Taz-Mania is different from the side-scrolling versions by Sega, in this version the player controls Taz from a third-person perspective. The goal of the game is to travel down the road, collecting Kiwi's before the timer runs out, avoiding obstacles along the way. The Kiwi's will get harder to catch as the game goes on, jumping over Taz and actually outrunning him at times.

name: Tetris Gems
description: Tetris Gems is an all-new Tetris game variant designed to both challenge and entertain puzzle fans. Whether you're new to Tetris or a seasoned expert, Tetris Gems rewards players for clearing lines and uncovering Gems. An added element of luck helps level the playing field, making Tetris Gems the perfect puzzler for all Tetris fans.

name: The Evil Farming Game: Replanted
description: Richard, an ordinary farmer in an ordinary island village, murders his wife. He must hide her from the authorities, and keep up the facades.

name: Asteroids: Far Away From Home
description: The game is about surviving in space and trying to get to home planet all while destroying asteroids and other threats. You gain upgrade points, power ups, arcade points while playing and ship boosts when you reach home planets. You can upgrade your ship from the main menu.

name: SunnySide
description: Find harmony in the Japanese countryside as you help Sparky uncover lost memories in this modern take on the farming and life simulator. Build a thriving homestead, cultivate new relationships, and chase your own happiness in SunnySide.

name: Haunt Chaser
description: Haunt Chaser is a horror game. Can be played as Single-player and 4v1 where one player takes control of a paranormal entity and Chasers needs to use all the hunting equipment in order to banish the evil and save the poor souls from torment while uncovering deeply disturbing secrets. Also can be played as 4 player co-op adventure game.

name: Alto's Odyssey: The Lost City
description:
Join Alto and his friends on an endless sandboarding journey to find The Lost City and unearth the secrets hidden within. Soar above windswept dunes, traverse thrilling canyons, explore ancient temples and delve into vast caverns in a fantastical place far from home.

On this journey, you’ll grind across vines, bounce atop hot air balloons, ride towering rock walls, glide in your wingsuit, and escape mischievous lemurs – all while uncovering the desert’s many mysteries.

Explore a new and unique biome with special hidden challenges, layered among the classic Alto’s Odyssey experience long-term fans know and love.

name: Chess
description:
A chess program for the Sinclair Spectrum with 48K RAM written in fast and efficient machine-code. The chessboard and chess peices are displayed in high resolution graphics.
Ten levels of Spectrum ability: level 2 will probably beat you!

name: Redtape
description: An indie adventure game in which players must get a document signed by Satan.

name: Beyond the Storm
description: Beyond the Storm is a love-letter to the iconic shmup Tyrian, bringing back the same experience from the past while adding improved visuals, new stories and a lot of more content!

name: A Message and an Advice
description: You are Khurshid, and you are going to die soon, so leave a video message behind, just so a certain someone will have some answers.

name: Reksio i Ortografia
description: Sin descripción

name: Vascolet: La Máquina del Tiempo
description: Sin descripción

name: Vascolet: La Fórmula Secreta
description: The secret Formula is the new Alejandro Vascolet's adventure inside the fantastic world of evil sorcerer Malmark. You must help Alejandro recover the book of the Secret Formula in a journey through five different levels.

name: BoF1LL: A Withering World
description: Together two companions will explore and restore their shrouded landscapes. Playable solo and in Couch Co-op!

name: The Rebellion
description: The Rebellion is a bold new take on real-time strategy that enables you to command from above and also seamlessly transition to 3rd person to join your warriors on the battlefield. Secure absolute victory by outfitting your army, harvesting resources, and waging all-out war in this dark divided empire.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura
description: Touhou Danmaku Kagura is a mobile rhythm game. It will be the first dedicated Touhou arrangement rhythm game to be released on smartphones and with gacha mechanics. The rhythm game session will be presenting the character having a danmaku battle against an opponent with a beatmap on the foreground. The player must beat the song played in the battle without missing too many beats.

name: División Especial de Detectives!
description: Sin descripción

name: XA: Contra Los Cuatreros Galácticos
description: An advergame published in 2010 by Batovi Games Studio based on the Megaman series of games and created to advertise Calcar's products. Enjoy!

name: Super Vampire Ninja Zero
description: This is a fighting game where you take control of Mina, a martial arts expert who has some demon and zombie's butts to kick!

name: Scribbled
description: A 100% handmade art, It was created with pencil and paper. Join this wonderful adventure in a world full of challenges and creatures. This game is made for all ages

name: Dungeon Bricker
description: Dungeon Bricker is an intense and exciting maze game. It’s a unique and interesting title where your focus is to try to move the player from wall to all or corner to corner in order to create a path of bricks and complete the level. Once the level is full of bricks, you can reach the next level. There are more than 150 levels to go through, and you will have a lot of fun enjoying every moment, while also testing your skills. Do you have what it takes to complete all levels?

name: Truck Simulator 2
description: Choose from various different vehicles and try to prove yourself as a professional driver in every one of them!

name: Zoo Dentist
description: Zoo dentist will teach kids not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth! Do not forget to clean them after each meal, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant experience.

name: G-Darius HD
description: Take flight in the iconic Silver Hawk and immerse yourself in thrilling gameplay with both modern HD-visuals or authentic retro-arcade graphics. Experience the conflicts between the Amnelia Kingdom and the merciless Thiima Empire that took place before the battle between the people of Darius and Belsar. During this conflict, the series’ iconic Silver Hawks were created to make use of the game’s unique capture ball system that allows you to forge your own strategy and gain an edge over the enemy! G-DARIUS HD is the port of “G-DARIUS” in high resolution – developed by the masters of remastering at M2. The game can also be played in low resolution like in the original arcade version. From the epic boss battles to the memorable soundtrack, G-DARIUS stood out when it first got released in the arcades and up to these days, critics and fans are praising this game as a prime example of how to bring a 2D game series properly to 3D.

name: Funny Truck
description: Throw annoying people out of your truck. Collect points.

name: Tower of Balloons: Otterrific Arcade
description: Welcome to Tower of Balloons, a standalone arcade mode featuring Testdra the dragon! Help Testdra stay afloat in the nonexistent tower by hopping off balloons, gliding on his feathery wings, and leaping off of enemy dragons! With a limitless number of friendly balloons and dangerous enemies inbound, how long can you survive?

name: Gearshifters: Collector's Edition
description:
Steer, drift, spin, smash and gun through waves of enemy vehicles. Go to war against extreme machine bosses. Build up and tune your tactical loadout of car mods, defences and weaponry for each treacherous transport mission. Drive. Destroy. Get Paid. Upgrade!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: Gearshifters
- Clothing Patch
- Soundtrack
- 4 x Art Cards

name: Coddle Pets: Dragon Garden
description:
Train Cute Dragons from babies to adults!

Level them up by playing mini games and exploring.

Carry those same dragons progression through a serious of different Coddle Pets titles.

name: The Hero We Need
description: The Hero We Need is a tower defense with real-time strategy elements with a focus on narrative where players have the power to create their own custom towers by crafting and combining runes.

name: Angry Birds Reloaded
description:
Classic Slingshot Action!

The world’s most famous flock has returned in a new version of the mobile game that took the world by storm. Join Red, Chuck, Bomb, Silver and the rest of the gang for classic slingshot action that will please fans of all ages. Angry Birds Reloaded features familiar physics-based gameplay from the original game - now remastered with visual enhancements, new characters, and plenty of destruction!

King Pig and his minions have stolen the eggs again and the birds will stop at nothing to get them back! Life on the island will never be the same now that the Angry Birds must face off against both Pigs AND Eagles from the Angry Birds movies in a battle to save their eggs and their home.

name: Jewel Match: Twilight 3 - Collector's Edition
description: Send shivers down your spine... with this creepy-crawly Match-3 quest that will chill you to the bone and make your flesh crawl. Discover eerie scenes and restore abandoned buildings, but beware of marauding creatures in this dark land.

name: Astria Ascending: Special Edition
description:
As one of the Fated Eight, explore the world of Orcanon where twelve ancient beasts dwell and fight against your destiny to save the world in this hand-drawn, turn-based JRPG.

The Special Edition includes:
- Game: Astria Ascending
- Artbook
- Original Soundtrack
- Map or Orcanon

name: XDefiant
description: Ubisoft's worlds collide in a free-to-play, first-person arena shooter where you compete to be the best in fast-paced online matches!

name: Yuki: Space Ranger
description:
Yuki is an epic adventure where you become a space ranger, in VR and MR!

You’ll face perils in deep space and your only companions throughout this journey are POD, your sidekick, and your own skill while playing. Dodge and defeat countless waves of projectiles and enemies while you get better and better with power-ups and charms to help you out.

name: XCOM Legends
description: XCOM’s newest mobile game turn-based RPG, available in limited territories.

name: Tyrannosaurus Tex
description: Cancelled science-fiction western themed First-Person Shooter for the Gameboy Colour, Originally developed by Slitherine. The rights and prototype were bought by retro indie publisher Piko Interactive, Who finished and released the game on boxed GBC cartridge.

name: Arbor
description: Arbor is a Roguelike game made to be very challenging and with a high score system similar to those old-school arcade games, find out how you stack up against other players!

name: Petz 4
description: Petz consists of Dogz 4 and Catz 4. Dogz and Catz are virtual petz that live on your computer. Players can adopt, raise, care for and breed their own Catz and Dogz. This title introduced companion Bunnies and Pigs, as well as travel playscenes.

name: Sonic Riders Tournament Edition
description: With balance changes, some tweaked mechanics, helpful features, and additional content, this build aims to create the definitive Sonic Riders competitive experience.

name: Funfair Party
description: Funfair Party assembles a variety of 23 funfair themed minigames for the Nintendo Wii. From simple target shooting to memory and reflex games inside or outside the circus tent, Funfair Party provides hours of fun and challenge for every member of the family. Featuring two distinct play modes, players can choose to immerse themselves in a heroic narrative where the success of each minigame helps a young boy stave-off a looming threat to the funfair, or, for a quicker play experience, pick-and-choose their favourite minigames to play with a friend. Funfair Party takes full advantage of the unique Wii Remote controller with a variety of gestural commands, custom-designed for each game.

name: Maths Play: Have Fun with Numbers!
description: Sin descripción

name: Context Insensitive
description: A game about configuring your keybindings.

name: Security Booth
description:
Security Booth is a VHS PSX Horror Game.

Based in 1996, you are working for a company known as Nova Nexus, you play as a security guard.
Your job role is to make sure that only the right authorized personnel are getting into the facility.

name: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout - Season 5
description: Get ready to stumble in the jungle! Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout Season 5 is fully-equipped with an adventurous theme featuring giant swinging logs, a mysterious Lost Temple and...mechanical Rhinos?!

name: Ski Run
description: Ski Run is a downhill skiing game where player must avoid obstacles on the ski run with further distances earning higher scores. Don't hit trees, other people or animals while going down and make sure to jump over gaps.

name: I Don't Know Which Name I Should Give This Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiger Rescue
description: Tiger Rescue is a military themed vertical shmup

name: Quake 4: Lightning Fast Mod Doom Edition
description: Quake 4 Lightning Fast Mod is a Doom mod for both single and multiplayer modes based on Quake 4

name: Office Point Rescue
description: Terrorists have invaded and taken hostages in the Emeraldalo Corporation's headquaters. Agent Foldon is assigned to infiltrate the building, dispatch the terrorists and rescue any surviving hostages.

name: Metavaxx
description:
Develop the ultimate vaccine in Metavaxx, the world's first minesweeper shooter!

Train your own new vaccine in body samples, either by shooting down the virus agents hidden in infected cells, or by isolating those cells, only clearing the healthy cells around them. You win when there are only healthy cells OR only infected cells remaining. Your vaccine's progress depends on how many remaining cells of either type you managed to preserve.

name: Gravity Brawl
description: Gravity Brawl is a 2d multiplayer shooter in zero gravity with tons of unique characters, wacky weapons, and power-ups. Shoot everything in sight while celebrating wins with your friends on team mode or solo play in 1 on 1 matches in a set of playable arenas to fly through. Shoot and you shall fly away, pushed back by your weapon backfire, drifting in the zero gravity arena where other brawlers are just waiting for your kill shot.

name: Florescer
description: Florescer is a story driven game delevoped with the help of a Brazilian NGO called Florescer, an organization that houses transsexual and transvestite women. The game is meant to invoke reflection and to generate empathy torwards trans people, inserting the player in the role of a teenage transgender girl and depicting the hardships and prejudices present in her daily life.

name: Chainsaw Dance
description:
Uh oh! It seems you are on a date with the Chainsaw Man!
He dismembers everything, and besides, you hardly understand what he is saying. Will you survive this date?

name: Knife to Meet You
description: A knife throwing game with total throw-control (spinning, power, direction), real physics simulation, object destruction (slicing, piercing, pinning), competitive leaderboards and replay system.

name: Among Dots
description: Maze 2D Pixel Game. To survive, Sora Amber must go through the mazes, running around the labyrinths and gathering energy dots to repair the important rooms of the abandon spaceship. Find super items that boost her strength, make her invisible and help her beat the enemies. Let's go! Sora chan !!

name: Final Fantasy Tactics 1.3
description: 1.3 is a mod made by Archael for the game Final Fantasy Tactics which greatly increases the game's difficulty by re-balancing the game. It alters enemies, items, jobs, skills, and fixes many gameplay mechanic exploits present in the original.

name: Doortal
description: Doortal is a puzzle game that bends reality. What is on the other side of a door depends on what shape you put in. Can you collect all the shapes? Can you visit all the dimensions? How fast can you do it?

name: Liberator
description: Written by D. R. Gamon this space shoot'em up is similar to Andrew Braybrook's Uridium. It was originally released by Magnificent 7 in a compilation called "Liberator / Space Fiends" in 1986 for Commodore 16. In 1987 Alternative Software re-released it as a single game.

name: Betsy's Hospital
description: A small, surreal exploration game based on a memory of a children's hospital.

name: Panilla Saga
description: Panilla Saga is a mobile Japanese-style idle card-collection game by More2Game which combines idle RPG and instant battle game elements. It is available for Android and iOS in Taiwan and Hong Kong/Macau and SEA regions.

name: Pottergame
description: Relive the magic of harry potter with this epic game.

name: Sadness of Valor
description: Commander aboard the Global Support Orbital Station (GSOS-3) capable of intervening rapidly on a part of the planet, ensuring the sustainability of humanity. Nothing ever goes as planned. Face the chaotic desert left by the planet and discover the mysteries of its history. In this RTS, alternate between management and combat with friends or soon on a machmaking!

name: Istanbul, Texas
description:
Istanbul, Texas is a music centric tale of destruction, regret and repair.

A man returns to his burnt down and emptied record store, drunk and alone. Drift through the record stacks left behind in Donny's Discount Dungeon, switching your soundtrack as you stumble through breathless thoughts of past and present.

name: The Sims 4: Limited Edition
description:
Unleash your imagination and create a unique world of Sims that's an expression of you! Explore and customize every detail from Sims to homes, and much more with The Sims 4. Life, and Sims, are yours to control. Customize your unique Sims, design their homes & take them on wild adventures through celebdom, romance, holidays and more.

The Sims 4: Limited Edition includes a copy of The Sims 4 and Life of the Party digital content, which features the Flaming Tiki Bar and sleek, stylized outfits for your Sims.

name: The Sims 4: Premium Edition
description:
Unleash your imagination and create a unique world of Sims that's an expression of you! Explore and customize every detail from Sims to homes, and much more with The Sims 4. Life, and Sims, are yours to control. Customize your unique Sims, design their homes & take them on wild adventures through celebdom, romance, holidays and more.

The Sims 4: Premium Edition includes a copy of The Sims 4, Life of the Party digital content, Up All Night digital content and the Creator's Guide hardcover book.

name: The Sims 4: Collector's Edition
description:
Unleash your imagination and create a unique world of Sims that's an expression of you! Explore and customize every detail from Sims to homes, and much more with The Sims 4. Customize your unique Sims, design their homes & take them on wild adventures through celebdom, romance, holidays and more.

The Sims 4: Collector’s Edition includes a copy of The Sims 4, Life of the Party digital content, Up All Night digital content, Awesome Animal Hats digital content, The Creator's Guide hardcover book, and an exclusive interactive USB Plumbob by SteelSeries.

name: Curtain
description:
CURTAIN is an interactive first-person narrative about Kaci & Ally, two queer women in a Glasgow punk band, which gives you a first hand experience of their destructive relationship.

Players embody Ally coming home to their apartment after a successful gig as Kaci, your partner, watches and comments on every thought and action, creating an overwhelming, stifling atmosphere

It takes about half an hour to finish, the game will exit itself.

name: Legends of Kingdom Rush
description:
An RPG game with roguelike elements developed in the medieval fantasy world of Kingdom Rush.

The Kingdom and the rest of the known world are now under the control of the dreadful Dark Army. However, a new threat bigger than the Dark Lord himself unites the heroes of the realm pushing the notions of good and evil aside.

Fight on a turn-based grid moving around the combat area. Switch and match your heroes and companions until you find your ideal team for each battle!

Find treasures, solve riddles, explore ruins, and so on. The world will react differently according to your decisions, so be careful!

name: Misc.
description:
It’s been following you for ages
Year after year
Apartment after apartment
But now it’s time
There is no turning back
You need to sort the "Misc." box.

name: The Isle is Full of Noises
description:
A storm is upon you. Your boat is small... and your destination shrouded. Follow the moon and greet your fellow travellers with care.

Your destiny awaits beyond the westbound lights... in the island's cavernous depths. Be not afeard... the isle is full of noises.

The Isle is Full of Noises is a '#flatgame'. There's intentionally no interaction or even collisions, except for moving the pieces around the screen. It's focused on presenting a game as the most raw and immediate combination of movement, art and sound. The Flat Game manifesto says that all you need to make a game and to present an idea is a couple hours, a laptop, and some markers.

name: Throne: Kingdom at War
description: Throne: Kingdom at War is a medieval-themed Plarium strategy game that has already gained a foothold on the mobile market and now is available as a browser game. Millions of players are vying for the Throne of Amaria, but only the bravest will earn the crown. To lead your Kingdom to prosperity, you shall have to become not only a skilled warrior in battle, but also a wise leader!

name: Frostory
description: A story driven pixel art action adventure game.

name: Dungeon Zer0
description:
Dungeon ZER0 is an epic dungeon game, based on the legendary The Legend Of Zelda games made by Nintendo.

In this game you embody Peter, a medium that has been all his life searching for the magatama, a mystic amulet that will provide him with the cherished endless life. In his journey, he will get into a scary dungeon full of monsters, mysteries, dangers and puzzles. Fight strong goblins, dodge sharp starsaws and survive for the sake of finding eternity.

In order to defend himself of the dangers of the dungeon, Peter will use his sword and his skill in order to defeat the mighty goblins. He also needs to use the Yearts to recover the lost health or the dungeon keys for opening doors. And make sure you don’t step on the spikes at the floor… cause it will hurt so much!

name: Detective S
description:
S became a detective to avenge her father R.
He was a detective killed by a serial killer 10 years ago.
In the end, the police couldn't uncover the case.
S felt the incompetence of the police and later became a detective herself.

name: Painting VR
description:
Painting in virtual reality is easy: mix your colors, dip in your brush and start painting.

The experience is very hands-on, easy to understand, and aimed at all ages. Play around and feel the relaxing satisfaction of putting unlimited amounts of fresh paint on a huge canvas. Teach yourself the basics of colors, the painting process and composition. Sharpen your skills by experimenting with the tools and techniques at hand, and become part of a new wave of digital artists. All without having to bother about cleaning up afterward.

name: Bananas in Pyjamas: It's Fun Time
description: Sing-a-long with B1, B2, the Teddies and Rat in a Hat... and much, much more! Take B1 and B2 on a wonderful adventure through the fun-filled world of Cuddles Avenue. Visit the beach, Rat in a Hat's shop, the park and the Bananas' house for hours of interactive fun and games. Bananas in Pyjamas: It's Fun Time uses the same unique blend of fun and learning that has made the television series a hit with children around the world.

name: Bananas in Pyjamas: It's Party Time
description: Bananas in Pyjamas, a worldwide phenomenon, and favorite for millions of children over the globe, has now come to the PC with this excellent new CD-ROM for young children. Join B1 and B2 on a wonderful adventure through the wacky world of Cuddles Avenue for hours of interactive fun and games. Bananas in Pyjamas help children develop a variety of skills, such as memory building, sequencing and problem solving. The program also enhances social skills such as sharing and co-operation, as well as encouraging children to join in with musical activities by playing instruments, singing and dancing.

name: Motocross
description: Motocross is a motorcycle racing game viewed from a top-down perspective. The player rides a bike against an endless number of opponents on a straight road, trying to avoid running into them. In addition, the player has to watch the amount of gas left in the tank. The goal of the game is to overtake a specified amount of bikes.

name: eFootball
description: eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami. Released in September 2021, it marks a significant shift in the Pro Evolution Soccer (PES) series. Konami rebranded the franchise to eFootball and transitioned to a free-to-play model and a new engine, Unreal Engine.

name: DownFall BattleGrounds
description: Downfall BattleGrounds, the upcoming Free-To-Play online survival game from NeoLife Studio. Players will have the opportunity to collect weapons to survive, team up with friends or go solo and even build their own bases! Get ready for an intense, action-packed adventure unlike any other!

name: The Legend of Neverland
description: The Legend of Neverland is an MMORPG set in a universe called Cabala. Something strange is happening in this utopia, and it's up to you to protect the innocent civilians who are being attacked by evil forces. After designing your character's appearance, you can start exploring this open world with more surprises than meets the eye.

name: Fire and Darkness
description: Fire and Darkness is a cancelled three-dimensional real-time strategy video game developed by Singularity Software. The game consists of a player controlling one of two factions, and their main mission is to defeat the enemy faction to secure the planet's resources. Although the project was incomplete, it became the first game to win the Seumas McNally Grand Prize at the Independent Games Festival of 1999.

name: The Wrestling Code
description: Sin descripción

name: Daiku no Medium
description:
A ship by the name of 'Lilith' has been navigating through space for two years with a single goal – reaching Eden, the heart of the Universe. The ship's team, consisting of Captain Lazarus, First Mate Anna and Second Mate Joseph, is constantly fighting through hundreds and hundreds of enemy 'Phantom 4s' that has been chasing them throughout the whole trip.

But the final frontier stands before them: Eden is almost within hand's reach...

name: Titan
description:
Titan is a HD remake of the 1988 game by Titus France.

The great block breaker developed by Titus Interactive in 1988 is back with a brand-new HD version featuring superb 3D environments.

Locked up in an 80-level tower by a mad scientist, use your brainpower to help you to escape.
Armed with your pod (a cubic robot) and a metal ball, avoid the numerous traps and try to find the way out.

Titan is an innovative block breaker in which you control a cube at the center of the screen that allows you to move a ball in all directions and destroy the bricks.
In this game, it is not reflexes that count because you are inside an enclosed arena and the ball cannot get out.
It is brainpower and strategy that will carry the day. In each arena, different surprises and riddles await you... you will have to try to understand how to get out and, above all, how to avoid the traps. Some bricks can be destroyed by the ball, others by your pod. Teleporters allow you to navigate from one zone to another, the ice makes you slide, while mortal robot-pods try to hunt you down and traps try to destroy you...

This title was delisted from Steam on August 8, 2018

name: Pokémon Omega Ruby and Pokémon Alpha Sapphire Dual Pack
description: Pokémon Omega Ruby and Pokémon Alpha Sapphire are 2014 remakes of the 2002 Game Boy Advance role-playing video games Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire, also including features from Pokémon Emerald. The games are part of the sixth generation of the Pokémon video game series.

name: Arashi: Castles of Sin
description: Become one with the shadows and embark on quest for justice as Kenshiro, a shinobi and the last surviving son of the noble House Arashi.

name: Action Pack I Prince of Persia: Revelations & Prince of Persia: Rival Swords
description: Sin descripción

name: Occupation 2.5
description:
First/Third Person Shooter.
Save the world from extraterrestrial invasion.

name: 2089: Space Divided
description: 2089: Space Divided is a classic science fiction real-time strategy game in which you collect resources, build up your base, raise troops and destroy your opponents with tactical finesse.

name: Idle Industries
description: Sin descripción

name: Grid Legends
description: What does it take to become a racing legend? Welcome to Grid Legends: a high-stakes driving experience that combines thrilling unpredictable motorsport, incredible race variety, and an immersive driving story that puts you at the heart of the action.

name: Apex Legends: Emergence
description:
Meet a new legend: With microdrones and an artist's eye, Seer spots opportunities that other Legends might miss, and seizes them in the most beautiful way he can.

Season 10 also comes with new weapons, ranked arenas and new scenery.

name: Knockout City: Season 2 - Fight at the Movies
description:
Fight at the Movies stars a new map, the Holowood Drive-In, where the playing field changes in real-time as you brawl through scenes from movies across every genre. What’s a movie without snacks, though? Grab yourself a concession-stand classic with the all-new Soda Ball. Time your throws to cover your rivals’ screens with sticky soda!

Season 2 also brings a new season of League Play (with its own shiny rewards), tons of new cosmetics, new Playlists, and more. Arrive to matches in style in a shiny new stretch limo Crew Vehicle, unlockable in all-new weekly Crew Contracts.

name: Dead Space
description: The sci-fi survival horror classic Dead Space returns, completely rebuilt from the ground up by Motive Studios to offer a deeper and more immersive experience. Harnessing the power of the Frostbite game engine and next generation consoles, this remake brings jaw-dropping visual fidelity and improvements to gameplay while staying true to the original.

name: Knockout City: Season 1 - Welcome to Knockout City
